title: Fix upload button flickering and add progress indicator

requirements.summary: Fix the upload button in the Features component so it responds correctly when clicked and does not just flicker
acceptanceCriteria: Upload button triggers file upload when clicked
Button does not flicker or display inconsistent visual states

file_operations.description: Fix the upload button click handler to prevent flickering by properly managing the file input element's state and event handling. Ensure the file input ref is correctly wired to trigger file selection dialog when the button is clicked. Remove any conflicting event handlers or state updates that cause visual inconsistencies.

requirements.summary: Add upload progress indicator showing percentage completion during file upload in the Features component
acceptanceCriteria: Progress percentage is displayed during file upload
Progress indicator updates in real-time as upload progresses
Progress reaches 100% when upload completes successfully
User receives clear feedback throughout the upload process

file_operations.description: Add upload progress state tracking with percentage value (0-100). Implement FileReader progress event handler to update progress state during file reading. Add UI component displaying the progress percentage with visual indicator (progress bar or percentage text). Ensure progress resets after successful upload or error.

requirements.summary: Display success or error status message after file upload completes in the Features component
acceptanceCriteria: Success message displays when upload completes successfully
Error message displays if upload fails
Status message is clearly visible to the user

file_operations.description: Add upload status state to track success/error states. Implement error handling in the file upload handler to catch parsing failures or file reading errors. Display success message when markdown file is successfully parsed and features are loaded. Display error message with appropriate context when upload fails. Ensure status messages are cleared when starting a new upload.
